paper_abstract: On roots of Ehrhart polynomials, Beck et al. conjecture that all roots alpha of the Ehrhart polynomial of an integral convex polytope of dimension d satisfy -da parts per thousand currency signa"e(alpha)a parts per thousand currency signd-1. In this paper, we provide counterexamples for this conjecture.
paper_title: Counterexamples of the Conjecture on Roots of Ehrhart Polynomials
